channel.title: Talks By Jayne B. Malan
channel.description: General Conference talks by Jayne B. Malan.

item.title: The Summer of the Lambs
item.description: The day school was out at the beginning of each summer, our family went to our ranch in Wyoming. It was there with my parents and brothers and sisters, and a few cousins mixed in, that I learned about family loyalty; love and concern; birth and death

item.title: These Are Your Days
item.description: When I was released as a stake Young Women president, I was surprised to find that it was camp that I missed most of all. I missed the fun and excitement of young women learning to appreciate the world around them, and the tender testimonies of those
